text:
#CARecall - @GavinNewsom remaining Gov. has significant lead.

No, keep him 52%,
Yes, remove him 44.4%,
Unsure 3.7%,

While @larryelder leads by a plurality if recall succeeds - according to @trafalgar_group  #CA #Recall #Poll conducted 8/26-29 See Report: https://t.co/oA0LIFe4aw https://t.co/IELqWeqbPj
